ratings.comment: Even though Thomas is nice, he does not TEACH you. He goes through problems without telling you what he's doing or why. So you don't learn anything and can't apply it to other problems. Get ready to teach yourself everything. He makes the most simple algebra problems very difficult. I got extremely frustrated with this class. Would not recommend.
He was not a good teacher, his tests were really hard but he didnt teach us at all. When he tried to explain things he made then way more complicated than they needed to be.
Thomas Edwards teaches like hes showing off what he knows without telling you what hes even doing. It was very hard to follow him on even the most basic equations or tasks.

Does not teach all materials needed in tests or homework. When asked questions, will sometimes ignore them or actively choose not to answer them. Very important to use textbook to teach yourself. Exam reviews sometimes don't correlate with actual exam content. Ask the TAs for help. Good luck.
Horrible! If your taking Math 112, be prepared to struggle. He do not know how to teach at all, and takes points off exams and quizzes for the simplest mistakes! Worst professor by far!

95% of the material he covers is irrelevant to homework/tests. I found it is best to seek the help of TA's and to just learn the math yourself from the book in order to do well. His time management in class is terrible since he will only cover bits and pieces of what he is trying to teach.

Worst teacher I've had first semester at Madison. He expects you to know most material before lecture, acting like we know everything. Sometimes very nitpicky when grading tests. Does not curve AT ALL, isn't generous with grading. Doesn't go over things in class that are on the test.

Does not teach, only writes out the problems without explanation and makes simple mistakes. He does not help you find the right answer when you ask him for help and sometimes it seems as if he doesn't even know how to solve the problems himself. The TAs are the ones that help you understand.

He acts as if everyone in the class should know the answers to all of the information, and doesn't enjoy to explain when asked. Is very condescending when asked questions and often jokes about questions people asks. If it were not for having taken this class in high school and the TAs, I would not have passed.
He doesn't teach at all. Super picky with grading and a lot of the review/exams are based on things he doesn't even teach. Awful professor and does not know how to teach
Doesn't actually teach, seems like he is teaching himself.
